entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • There needs to be a proper "new, unique" value number for exception sets #63559
    7.0.0
  • NullabilityInfoContext does not report the correct nullability for method in generic base class. #63555
  • Double quotes are escaped as \" in New JsonConsole #63554
  • `object.GetType` needs to have an exception set #63553
    7.0.0
  • `Dns.GetHostAddressesAsync` gets stuck on Windows #63552
  • Inject RegexGeneratorAttribute by source generator #63551
    7.0.0
  • JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull is not work as my expect when Serialize a JsonDocument #63550
  • Developers can use Generic Math without enabling preview features #63548
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose Buffer.ZeroMemory, add "modern" MemoryCopy overload #63547

Closed

  • Inefficient codegen using `for` instead of a simple `while`-loop #63544

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Convert RuntimeAssembly icalls to use QCallAssembly/ObjectHand… #63558
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Fix paramName in CryptoStream ArgumentExceptions #63557
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix NullabilityInfoContext.Create to properly analyze types with nested generic types #63556
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Remove leading and trailing white-spaces from section name #63549
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Use static abstract interface methods in SymbolicRegexMatcher #63546
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • [metadata] Borrow bits from MonoClassField:parent for flags #63302
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Webpack & NextJS & TypeScript samples #63335
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1543911 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix non-portable coreclr arm64 build #63121
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • Fix Regex if-then-else code generation #63427
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Add blsr #63545
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft] hot reload wip #63513
    area-EnC-mono
  • Improve auto-atomicity for conditionals #63299
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0-maui] Add back HAVE_SYS_ZLIB support #63359
    area-Build-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `System.Drawing.Graphics.NativeGraphics`. #63058
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable IDE0059 analyzer: Unnecessary assignment of a value #63340
    area-Meta
  • Exception sets: debug checker & fixes #63539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add the `coreclr/unwinder/loongarch64` from the #62979. #63489
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Added DrawRectangle overload accepting RectangleF #62385
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.StringLanguageAttribute #62995
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix hang in ArrayTests #63528
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Use C# 10's enhanced struct initialization features #63131
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Improve auto-atomicity for Regex loops #63518
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Properties and items aren't logged at evaluation for `dotnet build` #23248
  • `dotnet new console --help` doesn't work starting 6.0.2xx #23162

Updated

  • Define a platform-agnostic NET preprocessor symbol #22788
    Backlog
  • Windows Update error 0x80070643 trying to install "2021-11 .NET 5.0.12 Update for x64 Client (KB5007884)" #23307
  • Missing packages for Ubuntu 21.04 aarch64/arm64 #17683
    Discussion
  • `dotnet run` gives `ArgumentOutOfRangeException` error at `TryGetTargetArchitecture` method #23004
  • `dotnet run` cannot run the project due to `System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: startIndex cannot be larger than length of string. (Parameter 'startIndex')` exception #23148

PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23286
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Studio does not suggest changing the language version to preview when using generic attributes. #58742
  • Missing IConstructorBodyOperation for types with PrimaryConstructor #58741
  • Code fix actions not properly loaded after updating analyzer package #58740
  • list pattern with conjunctive and pattern #58738

Closed

  • Add codefix for `ERR_StructHasInitializersAndNoDeclaredConstructor` (CS8983) #58593
    17.1.P2

PullRequests

Created

  • Integration test options #58744
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Offer to generate parameterless constructor for structs to fix CS8983 #58743
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Minor simplification in EnC #58728
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #58737
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #58736
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #58735
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #58734
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Don't crash when default namespace isn't a valid name #58704
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Slice value is assumed to be never null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Rename and share CompilerAnalyzerConfigOptions #58579
    Area-Analyzers
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Required modifier parsing #58431
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • k8s docker connection reset by peer / Unexpected end of request content #39393
  • Perf regression: https, json #39392
  • RE-open: Blazor redirect to cshtml not work with renderMode = Server #39391
  • Blazor NavigationManager additional features #39390
  • Update the Razor / Roslyn version used by runtime compilation package #39387
    .NET 7.0

Closed

  • Model binder does not bind properties with private setter #38243
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #39389
  • Perf improvement: json_netty #39368
  • Razor Source Generator question/follow-up regarding comment in .NET Conf session. #38238
    Discussions
  • POSTing large form data silently results in null-parameters #36214
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Added support for binding the raw request body #39388
    area-runtime

Updated

  • Update Mvc to use LoggerMessageAttribute #38658
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Allow runtime compilation to be configured via the hosting startup. #39381
    area-mvc
  • Detect HTTP version on invalid HTTP/2 connection #39358
    area-runtime
  • Using symbolic link APIs on PhysicalFileResult to obtain the real Length and LastModifiedTime #39330
    area-mvc
  • Avoid logging unsupported alternative for complex type binding #39353
    area-mvc
